document_data.name: Argent Palace
document_data.mainbody: The '''Argent Palace''' was [[Graz'zt]]'s personal home in the city of [[Zelatar]].
document_data.Structure: The palace was composed of sixty-six ivory towers and scores and scores of mirrored hallways. The cold but meticulous hallways were filled with wandering [[bodaks]] and other more malevolent [[abyss|abyssal]] denizens as part of the [[demon]] lord's amusements. Woe to those residents of Zelatar who received an invitation to an audience with Graz'zt in his palace!
document_data.Inhabitants: From his palace, Graz'zt planned and schemed his intricate plots to gain more power while thwarting his enemies.
